body_html:
Thanks for the tips. I think I figured it out - separately, I was getting
some earlier errors in the install process ('operation not permitted'), and
discovered that OSX El Capitan last month added something called SIP which
was partially screwing up my installation. I went ahead and tried the
virtualenv installation and everything is working.

On Mon, Feb 22, 2016 at 1:21 AM Sean Saito notifications@github.com wrote:

+1 @hsaito https://github.com/hsaito 's solution works for me too.
Using Ubuntu 14.04.4

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
#487 (comment)
.

body:
Thanks for the tips. I think I figured it out - separately, I was getting
some earlier errors in the install process ('operation not permitted'), and
discovered that OSX El Capitan last month added something called SIP which
was partially screwing up my installation.  I went ahead and tried the
virtualenv installation and everything is working.

On Mon, Feb 22, 2016 at 1:21 AM Sean Saito notifications@github.com wrote:

> +1 @hsaito https://github.com/hsaito 's solution works for me too.
> Using Ubuntu 14.04.4
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/487#issuecomment-187086353
> .
